attributes.action: Drop Tim Howard out of the Everton squad instantly
attributes.additional_details:
Everton have conceded 28 goals this season after 19 games, a woeful record for a club with high standards.
Everton have only recorded only 5 clean sheets this season, Simply down to Howard
Everton have conceded 7 goals in their last 2 home games, a truly shocking stat for a team commonly known for its solid defence  
Joel Robles (second choice keeper) has only played 4 games so far for Everton this season, in which Everton won all 4 games with the spaniard in net.
attributes.background: Everton have fantastic fans that make the effort to go Home and Away games and get nothing in return because of such a awful goalkeeper losing them points. Their manager Roberto Martinez is stubborn to drop him from the squad and he is becoming worse each game. Please vote, this must change soon!
